blogPost.title: The Turkish lira has plummeted, but so far the world’s biggest emerging markets have avoided contagion, explains @ahirtens #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/OXgNaH18ky
blogPost.author: The Wall Street Journal

localize.full_text: トルコリラは急落したが、今のところ世界最大の新興市場は伝染を免れている、と @ahirtens 氏は説明する #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/OXgNaH18ky
土耳其里拉暴跌，但到目前为止，世界上最大的新兴市场都避免了危机的蔓延，@ahirtens 解释道 #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/OXgNaH18ky
土耳其里拉暴跌，但到目前爲止，世界上最大的新興市場都避免了危機的蔓延，@ahirtens 解釋道 #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/OXgNaH18ky

previous.title: The U.K. and Canada have joined a widening diplomatic boycott of the 2022 Winter Olympics in Beijing https://t.co/uSq6csOS1O
